subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Andy Sonnanstine gave up five hits in seven innings to win his fourth consecutive decision and Ben Zobrist homered again as the Tampa Bay Rays beat the visiting Kansas City Royals, 3-0.
snippet: Andy Sonnanstine gave up five hits in seven innings to win his fourth consecutive decision and Ben Zobrist homered again as the Tampa Bay Rays beat the visiting Kansas City Royals, 3-0.
